title: Finance Domain Schema
description: Schema for the Finance domain in the Orthogramic Metamodel

financeID.description: Unique identifier for the finance element

title.description: The name or title of the financial structure or element

description.description: A detailed explanation of the financial element

financeDefinition.description: Definition of financial boundaries and characteristics

orgUnitTitle.description: The organization unit(s) responsible for financial management

orgUnitRoles.description: Specific roles within the organization unit that manage financial elements

valuationMethod.description: Method used to calculate financial value

accountingTreatment.description: How the financial element is treated in accounting systems

governanceModel.description: Approach to financial governance and oversight

complianceRequirements.description: Regulatory and reporting requirements for financial management

approvalAuthority.description: Roles or bodies with approval authority for financial decisions

marketInfluences.description: Market factors affecting the financial element

riskProfile.description: Risk characteristics of the financial element

performanceIndicators.description: Metrics used to measure financial performance

metricDescription.description: Description of what the metric measures

dependencies.description: Other domains, processes, or systems supporting financial management

domainType.description: Type of domain this depends on

entityID.description: ID of the entity being depended upon

relatedFinancialElements.description: Other financial elements with relationships to this one

elementID.description: ID of the related financial element

improvementOpportunities.description: Areas where financial management can be enhanced

title: Financial Resource Schema
description: Schema for Financial Resource element in the Finance domain

resourceID.description: Unique identifier for the financial resource

resourceName.description: Name of the specific financial resource

description.description: Detailed description of the financial resource

orgUnitTitle.description: The organization unit responsible for managing this resource

financeID.description: ID of the finance domain this resource belongs to

accountingClassification.description: How the resource is classified in accounting systems

maturityDate.description: When the resource matures or expires

lifecycleStage.description: Current stage in the resource lifecycle

refreshCycle.description: Frequency of resource renewal or review

performanceBenchmarks.description: Key metrics for evaluating resource performance

strategicPurpose.description: How this resource supports strategic objectives

governanceControls.description: Controls and governance applied to the resource

linkedCapabilities.description: Business capabilities supported by this resource

monitoringFrequency.description: How often this resource is formally assessed

title: Budget Schema
description: Schema for Budget element in the Finance domain

description.description: Detailed explanation of the budget's purpose and scope

orgUnitTitle.description: The organization unit responsible for this budget

financeID.description: ID of the finance domain this budget belongs to

budgetPeriod.description: Time period covered by the budget

amountType.description: Whether amount is planned, approved, or actual

categoryDescription.description: Description of what the category includes

allocationMethodology.description: Approach used to allocate funds across categories

approvalStatus.description: Current approval status of the budget

approvalAuthority.description: Individual or group with budget approval authority

strategicAlignment.description: How the budget aligns with strategic objectives

allocationPercentage.description: Percentage of budget supporting this objective

title: Investment Schema
description: Schema for Investment element in the Finance domain

orgUnitTitle.description: The organization unit responsible for this investment

financeID.description: ID of the finance domain this investment belongs to

timeHorizon.description: When returns are expected to materialize

title: Revenue Stream Schema
description: Schema for Revenue Stream element in the Finance domain

streamID.description: Unique identifier for the revenue stream

streamName.description: Name of the specific revenue stream

description.description: Detailed explanation of the revenue stream

orgUnitTitle.description: The organization unit responsible for this revenue stream

financeID.description: ID of the finance domain this revenue stream belongs to

financialPerformance.description: Financial metrics for the revenue stream

growthStrategies.description: Approaches to growing this revenue stream

strategicImportance.description: Strategic significance of this revenue stream

title: Cost Structure Schema
description: Schema for Cost Structure element in the Finance domain

costStructureID.description: Unique identifier for the cost structure

structureName.description: Name of the specific cost structure

description.description: Detailed explanation of the cost structure

orgUnitTitle.description: The organization unit associated with this cost structure

financeID.description: ID of the finance domain this cost structure belongs to

costClassification.description: Primary classification of the cost structure

fixedCosts.description: Costs that remain constant regardless of activity level

variableCosts.description: Costs that change with activity level

directCosts.description: Costs directly attributable to specific outputs

indirectCosts.description: Costs not directly attributable to specific outputs

costAllocationModel.description: How costs are distributed across the organization

financialImpact.description: How cost structure affects financial performance

linkedValueStreams.description: Value streams associated with these costs

lastUpdated.description: Date of last cost analysis update
